nodes.text: Anelsana was a planet in the galaxy. In 3 BBY, Bail Organa gave his daughter, Princess Leia Organa, a list of potential candidates to receive humanitarian aid. She noted that Anelsana had suffered in the aftermath of a trade embargo, and that due to her father limiting her travels to the more rural northern continent, she would not find as much proof of this compared to what she could find if she traveled to Anelsana's main cities.
Anelsana was first mentioned in Leia, Princess of Alderaan, a 2017 young-adult novel written by Claudia Gray that was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi publishing program.
